field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item in the form Surname, Firstname [i.e. Smith, Josh or Smith, J].

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the name of any sponsors.

field.label: Project
field.hint: Enter the name of project, if any, that has produced this publication.

field.label: Journal
field.hint: Enter the name of the journal where the item has been published, if any.

field.label: Conference
field.hint: Enter the name of the conference where the item has been presented, if any.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.hint: Enter the first day of membership for the current level
field.required: You need to enter the first day of membership

field.label: End date
field.hint: Enter the last day of membership for the current level
field.required: You need to enter the last day of membership

field.label: Parent organisation
field.hint: If you are applying for membership for a sub-unit / department of a larger organisation please enter the here the name of the parent organisation

field.required: This field is required

field.hint: if any / other than the name

field.hint: or of CRIS information page

field.required: You must select the project status

field.label: Software used
field.hint: Keep empty in case of inhouse software, otherwise use the autocomplete to lookup in the general purpose solutions (commercial or opensource) or to provide the inclusion of a new software

field.label: CERIF Compatibility of your CRIS
field.hint:
• CERIF: CERIF as storage model so CERIF interface for query and reporting
  • CERIF wrapped: Non-CERIF storage model but CERIF interface (query and reporting)
  • Non-CERIF: storage model non-CERIF; no CERIF interface for query and reporting

field.label: CERIF version
field.hint: In case of CERIF compatibility: specify the version

field.label: Coverage of the CRIS
field.hint: what is registered in your CRIS? (Check all boxes that apply)

field.label: Is there an interface/link of the CRIS with other systems in the institution/organisation?
field.hint: Check all boxes that apply

field.label: Is there an interface/link of the CRIS with EXTERNAL systems outside the institution/organisation?
field.hint: Check all boxes that apply

field.label: No of Researchers in your institution
field.hint: As in the previous year. Format: 10000 (so WITHOUT "." or ",")

field.label: No of registered users for CRIS (if registration is necessary)
field.hint: As in the previous year. Format: 10000 (so WITHOUT "." or ",")

field.label: No of database requests for CRIS
field.hint: As in the previous year. Format: 10000 (so WITHOUT "." or ",")

field.label: CRIS data supply
field.hint: Who (internal unit, outsourcing) is responsible for?

field.label: CRIS data validation
field.hint: Who (internal unit, outsourcing) is responsible for?

field.label: CRIS data output generation
field.hint: Who (internal unit, outsourcing) is responsible for?

field.label: ICT support of the CRIS
field.hint: Who (internal unit, outsourcing) is responsible for?

field.label: Where is the publication metadata primarily registered?
Is there a link between the CRIS and the Repository?
If (dynamically) linked: Direction of link when it comes to METADATA
If (dynamically) linked: Direction of link when it comes to FULL TEXT
Organisation / Institute
field.hint:
Additional information on your Publication Repository

This part deals with information on the publication repository of your institution (provided you have one).

The survey has been composed by the euroCRIS Task Group on CRIS and Institutional Repositories (CRIS-IR). The information will not be published in the Directory of Research Information Systems, but the data are of importance for the work of the CRIS-IR Task Group. So you are kindly invited to fill in this second part of the questionnaire. Thank you for supporting our work.


Provider of the Repository (Official operator of the system - not: provider of software) - Keep empty if the same than CRIS

field.label: Contact person
field.hint: Enter the Lastname, Firstname of the official point of contact for the Repository Registration (This information is needed for internal purposes only. Please register here the person best suited to contact about the DRIS registration).

field.label: URL of the Repository
field.hint: or of Repository information page

field.label: In case of INSTITUTIONAL Repository. Is there a mandatory policy?
Software used
field.hint: Keep empty in case of inhouse software, otherwise use the autocomplete to lookup in the general purpose solutions (commercial or opensource) or to provide the inclusion of a new software

field.label: Coverage of the Repository
field.hint: what is deposited in your Repository? (Check all boxes that apply)

field.label: Media Types supported
field.hint: Check all boxes that apply

field.label: Metadata Standards
field.hint: What kind of metadata standards are used for the repository? (Check all boxes that apply)

field.label: Repository document and data supply
field.hint: Who (internal unit, outsourcing) is responsible for?

field.label: Repository document and data validation
field.hint: Who (internal unit, outsourcing) is responsible for?

field.label: ICT support of the Repository
field.hint: Who (internal unit, outsourcing) is responsible for?

field.label: No of registered users for Repository (if registration is necessary)
field.hint: As in the previous year. Format: 10000 (so WITHOUT "." or ",")

field.label: No of database requests for Repository
field.hint: As in the previous year. Format: 10000 (so WITHOUT "." or ",")

pair.displayed-value: Products (resulting from research: e.g. software, video, audio)
Services (as outcome of research or linked to research)
CRIS and Repository dynamically linked (e.g. by web service)
CRIS and Repository integrated into one system
CRIS offers Metadata to the Repository
pair.stored-value: CRIS offers Metadata to the Repository

pair.displayed-value: Full text primarily stored in CRIS and copied to Repository
pair.stored-value: Full text primarily stored in CRIS and copied to Repository

pair.displayed-value: Full text stored in CRIS and URL supplied to Repository
pair.stored-value: Full text stored in CRIS and URL supplied to Repository

pair.displayed-value: Full text primarily stored in Repository and copied to CRIS
pair.stored-value: Full text primarily stored in Repository and copied to CRIS

pair.displayed-value: Full text stored in Repository and URL supplied to CRIS
pair.stored-value: Full text stored in Repository and URL supplied to CRIS
